field.name: MAP
field.description: System memory remap

enumeratedValue.name: BOOT_LOADER_MODE_IN
enumeratedValue.description: Boot Loader Mode. Interrupt vectors are re-mapped to Boot ROM

enumeratedValue.name: USER_RAM_MODE_INTER
enumeratedValue.description: User RAM Mode. Interrupt vectors are re-mapped to Static RAM

enumeratedValue.name: USER_FLASH_MODE_INT
enumeratedValue.description: User Flash Mode. Interrupt vectors are not re-mapped and reside in Flash

field.name: SSP0_RST_N
field.description: SPI0 reset control

field.name: I2C_RST_N
field.description: I2C reset control

field.name: SSP1_RST_N
field.description: SPI1 reset control

field.name: CAN_RST_N
field.description: C_CAN reset control. See Section 3.1 for part specific details

field.name: MSEL
field.description: Feedback divider value. The division value M is the programmed MSEL value + 1. 00000: Division ratio M = 1 to 11111: Division ratio M = 32

field.name: PSEL
field.description: Post divider ratio P. The division ratio is 2 x P

field.name: LOCK
field.description: PLL lock status

field.name: BYPASS
field.description: Bypass system oscillator

enumeratedValue.name: BYPASS_ENABLED_PLL_
enumeratedValue.description: Bypass enabled. PLL input (sys_osc_clk) is fed directly from the XTALIN and XTALOUT pins

field.name: FREQRANGE
field.description: Determines frequency range for Low-power oscillator

field.name: DIVSEL
field.description: Select divider for Fclkana. wdt_osc_clk = Fclkana/ (2 x (1 + DIVSEL)) 00000: 2 x (1 + DIVSEL) = 2 00001: 2 x (1 + DIVSEL) = 4 to 11111: 2 x (1 + DIVSEL) = 64

field.name: FREQSEL
field.description: Select watchdog oscillator analog output frequency (Fclkana)

field.name: TRIM
field.description: Trim value

field.name: POR
field.description: POR reset status

enumeratedValue.name: POR_DETECTED_WRITIN
enumeratedValue.description: POR detected. Writing a one clears this reset

field.name: EXTRST
field.description: Status of the external RESET pin

enumeratedValue.name: RESET_DETECTED_WRIT
enumeratedValue.description: RESET detected. Writing a one clears this reset

field.name: WDT
field.description: Status of the Watchdog reset

enumeratedValue.name: WDT_RESET_DETECTED_
enumeratedValue.description: WDT reset detected. Writing a one clears this reset

field.name: BOD
field.description: Status of the Brown-out detect reset

enumeratedValue.name: BOD_RESET_DETECTED_
enumeratedValue.description: BOD reset detected. Writing a one clears this reset

field.name: SYSRST
field.description: Status of the software system reset

enumeratedValue.name: SYSTEM_RESET_DETECTE
enumeratedValue.description: System reset detected. Writing a one clears this reset

field.name: SEL
field.description: System PLL clock source

register.name: SYSPLLCLKUEN
register.description: System PLL clock source update enable

field.name: ENA
field.description: Enable system PLL clock source update

field.name: SEL
field.description: Clock source for main clock

field.name: ENA
field.description: Enable main clock source update

field.name: DIV
field.description: System AHB clock divider values 0: System clock disabled. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: SYS
field.description: Enables clock for AHB to APB bridge, to the AHB matrix, to the Cortex-M0 FCLK and HCLK, to the SysCon, and to the PMU. This bit is read only

field.name: ROM
field.description: Enables clock for ROM

field.name: RAM
field.description: Enables clock for RAM

field.name: FLASHREG
field.description: Enables clock for flash register interface

field.name: FLASHARRAY
field.description: Enables clock for flash array access

field.name: I2C
field.description: Enables clock for I2C

field.name: GPIO
field.description: Enables clock for GPIO

field.name: CT16B0
field.description: Enables clock for 16-bit counter/timer 0

field.name: CT16B1
field.description: Enables clock for 16-bit counter/timer 1

field.name: CT32B0
field.description: Enables clock for 32-bit counter/timer 0

field.name: CT32B1
field.description: Enables clock for 32-bit counter/timer 1

field.name: SSP0
field.description: Enables clock for SPI0

field.name: UART
field.description: Enables clock for UART. See Section 3.1 for part specific details

field.name: ADC
field.description: Enables clock for ADC

field.name: WDT
field.description: Enables clock for WDT

field.name: IOCON
field.description: Enables clock for I/O configuration block

field.name: CAN
field.description: Enables clock for C_CAN. See Section 3.1 for part specific details

field.name: SSP1
field.description: Enables clock for SPI1

field.name: DIV
field.description: SPI0_PCLK clock divider values 0: Disable SPI0_PCLK. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: DIV
field.description: UART_PCLK clock divider values 0: Disable UART_PCLK. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: DIV
field.description: SPI1_PCLK clock divider values 0: Disable SPI1_PCLK. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: SEL
field.description: WDT clock source

field.name: ENA
field.description: Enable WDT clock source update

field.name: DIV
field.description: WDT clock divider values 0: Disable WDCLK. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: SEL
field.description: CLKOUT clock source

field.name: ENA
field.description: Enable CLKOUT clock source update

field.name: DIV
field.description: Clock output divider values 0: Disable CLKOUT. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: CAPPIO0_n
field.description: Raw reset status input PIO0_n: PIO0_11 to PIO0_0

field.name: CAPPIO1_n
field.description: Raw reset status input PIO1_n: PIO1_11 to PIO1_0

field.name: CAPPIO2_n
field.description: Raw reset status input PIO2_n: PIO2_7 to PIO2_0

field.name: CAPPIO2_8
field.description: Raw reset status input PIO2_8

field.name: CAPPIO2_9
field.description: Raw reset status input PIO2_9

field.name: CAPPIO2_10
field.description: Raw reset status input PIO2_10

field.name: CAPPIO2_11
field.description: Raw reset status input PIO2_11

field.name: CAPPIO3_0
field.description: Raw reset status input PIO3_0

field.name: CAPPIO3_1
field.description: Raw reset status input PIO3_1

field.name: CAPPIO3_2
field.description: Raw reset status input PIO3_2

field.name: CAPPIO3_3
field.description: Raw reset status input PIO3_3

field.name: CAPPIO3_4
field.description: Raw reset status input PIO3_4

field.name: CAPPIO3_5
field.description: Raw reset status input PIO3_5

field.name: BODRSTLEV
field.description: BOD reset level

enumeratedValue.name: LEVEL_0_THE_RESET_A
enumeratedValue.description: Level 0: The reset assertion threshold voltage is 1.46 V; the reset de-assertion threshold voltage is 1.63 V

enumeratedValue.name: LEVEL_1_THE_RESET_A
enumeratedValue.description: Level 1: The reset assertion threshold voltage is 2.06 V; the reset de-assertion threshold voltage is 2.15 V

enumeratedValue.name: LEVEL_2_THE_RESET_A
enumeratedValue.description: Level 2: The reset assertion threshold voltage is 2.35 V; the reset de-assertion threshold voltage is 2.43 V

enumeratedValue.name: LEVEL_3_THE_RESET_A
enumeratedValue.description: Level 3: The reset assertion threshold voltage is 2.63 V; the reset de-assertion threshold voltage is 2.71 V

field.name: BODINTVAL
field.description: BOD interrupt level

enumeratedValue.name: LEVEL_0_THE_INTERRU
enumeratedValue.description: Level 0: The interrupt assertion threshold voltage is 1.65 V; the interrupt de-assertion threshold voltage is 1.80 V

enumeratedValue.name: LEVEL_1THE_INTERRUP
enumeratedValue.description: Level 1:The interrupt assertion threshold voltage is 2.22 V; the interrupt de-assertion threshold voltage is 2.35 V

enumeratedValue.name: LEVEL_2_THE_INTERRU
enumeratedValue.description: Level 2: The interrupt assertion threshold voltage is 2.52 V; the interrupt de-assertion threshold voltage is 2.66 V

enumeratedValue.name: LEVEL_3_THE_INTERRU
enumeratedValue.description: Level 3: The interrupt assertion threshold voltage is 2.80 V; the interrupt de-assertion threshold voltage is 2.90 V

field.name: BODRSTENA
field.description: BOD reset enable

field.name: CAL
field.description: System tick timer calibration value

field.name: IRQNO
field.description: The IRQ number of the interrupt that acts as the Non-Maskable Interrupt (NMI) if bit 31 in this register is 1. See Table 54 for the list of interrupt sources and their IRQ numbers

field.name: NMIEN
field.description: Write a 1 to this bit to enable the Non-Maskable Interrupt (NMI) source selected by bits 4:0

field.name: NOTUSED0
field.description: Reserved. Always write these bits as 111

field.description: BOD power-down control in Deep-sleep mode, see Table 40

field.description: Reserved. Always write these bits as 11

field.description: Reserved. Always write these bits as 000

field.description: Reserved. Always write these bits as 11
